alert.note: Alert for Lake; Orange (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 8:09PM EDT until June 19 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LAKE AND NORTHWESTERN ORANGE COUNTIES... At 808 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tavares to near Groveland, moving east at 30 mph. Terminal Doppler weather radar form Orlando continues to indicate wind gusts near 60 mph possible with this band of storms. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Winter Garden, Tavares, Groveland and Mascotte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
